data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 981 cultural Christians in the state of Sund to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sund, Åland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Sund prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 83 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Sund, Åland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Sund, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sund, Åland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Sund.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Sund words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
